title: Vindication # 962 (Ep 962)
description:
In this episode I address the vindication of Donald Trump and the ridiculous Mueller report, which goes out of its way to harm Donald Trump. News Picks:
The Mueller report has been released. 
 
Devin Nunes slams the Mueller report for ignoring the real scandal. 
 
The Trump team warns the Obama era DOJ that Justice will be served. 
 
The Trump legal team responds saying this is a total victory for the President. 
 
Are US intelligence agencies dominated by liberals?
 
Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
